%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% variables. only edit this section
\def\subjectNum{4}
%% 1: DBMS
%% 2: NM
%% 3: OS
%% 4: SCR
%% 5: S.Eng

\def\labNum{4}
\def\labTitle{PHP \& MySQL}
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% custom commands. DO NOT EDIT
\newcommand{\subject}[1]{%
    \ifnum#1=1
        Database Management System
    \else\ifnum#1=2
        Numerical Methods
    \else\ifnum#1=3
        Operating System
    \else\ifnum#1=4
        Scripting Language
    \else
        <Insert Subject no.>
    \fi\fi\fi\fi
}
\newcommand{\teacher}[1]{%
    \ifnum#1=1
        Mr. Nawaraj Singh Thakuri
    \else\ifnum#1=2
        <Insert name>
    \else\ifnum#1=3
        Mr. Roshan Maharjan
    \else\ifnum#1=4
        Mr. Diwas K.C.
    \else
        <Insert name>
    \fi\fi\fi\fi
}
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% title
\title{Lab report on: \\\subject{\subjectNum}Lab \labNum: \\\labTitle}
\author{Sujal Gurung \\ Roll no: 34}
\date{\today}
